title: Tamma Tamma Again: Watch Bappi Lahiri singing original in Alia Bhatt’s video | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Tamma Tamma Again: Watch Bappi Lahiri singing original in Alia Bhatt’s video bollywood Updated: Feb 13, 2017 14:29 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Badrinath Ki Dulhania is set to hit the screens on March 10, 2017. 
The new version of Bappi Lahiri and Anuradha Paudwal’s superhit song from Thanedar (1990) is ruling the music charts as it has already crosses 18 million views on YouTube. And now, Alia Bhatt has shared a video in which Bappi Lahiri is singing the original song. — Alia Bhatt (@aliaa08) February 13, 2017 
The remixed version, which has kept the original voices untouched, is from director Shashank Khaitan’s upcoming film Badrinath Ki Dulhania. The film has Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt in the lead roles. It’s remastered by Tanishk Bagchi and also has Badshah’s name on the list of singers. 
Coming back to the original song, it was a chartbuster for many months in 1990, thanks to its peppy tune and Madhuri Dixit’s unmatched steps. 
A couple of days ago, a viral video saw Madhuri teaching her signature steps from the song to Alia and Varun. Read more
